item.title: GmBIR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G079200 Gene Symbol: GmBIR1 Gene Name: BAK1-INTERACTING RECEPTOR LIKE KINASE1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean immune receptor GmBIR1 regulates host transcriptome, spliceome, and immunity during cyst nematode infection.

item.title: MeABA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.10G150700 Gene Symbol: MeABA1 Gene Name: ABA DEFICIENT 1 Genome: high-quality genome sequence Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The intron retention transcript of MeABA1 (ABA DEFICIENT 1) was highly correlated with PPD symptoms in cassava storage roots.
